original: rewrite Hv. rewrite Am_iAm_mod. unfold A. simpl. rewrite Z2Zp_morph. rewrite expoZ_opp1. destruct (mscal Z.mul 1 l (-1)) eqn:E. - destruct (expoZ j (α (S j))) eqn:E'. + reflexivity. + exfalso. apply expoZ_not_1 in E'. apply E'. - destruct (expoZ j (α (S j))) eqn:E'. + exfalso. apply n. reflexivity. + reflexivity.
